channel.title: I need help recoloring an item set

item.title: I need help recoloring an item set
item.dc:creator: @ill4ev ill4ev
item.description:
@ill4ev wrote:

ok well on my server i have the mod and admin armor, but i want to make owner armor that looks like what you can see in the picture.

I managed to make the trim red, but i cant get the base color from gold to black.
here’s the code from my class8.java from my client:

if(i == 15068) {
NEO(“Admin Crown”, “Made by Jukk”, “Wear”);
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
NewColor(926, 945, 0);
Zoom(500, 90, 0, 0, 0, false);
Models(8774, 8774, 8774);
}

Read full topic
item.source: I need help recoloring an item set
